emote.pleasure: Lustful and aroused but not climaxing
emote.climax: Orgasmic tone or reaching sexual high
emote.mocking: Teasing or dominant tone, often by corrupted characters
emote.agony: Pained or suffering, but not crying

skip.description: Tag used to exclude low-quality, empty, or irrelevant lines from training.
skip.use: Apply to silence, heavily distorted segments, or lines not useful for voice modeling.

fx.description: Non-verbal expressive segments such as moans, gasps, and breathing sounds.
fx.use: Useful for training separate FX or moan-dedicated voice models.

emotion_confidence.description: Estimated certainty of the assigned emotion based on keyword strength, pitch, and pacing alignment.
emotion_confidence.use: Can be used to filter training samples or down-weight uncertain ones.
